column2: BRIEF-Rollins Board Declared Qtrly Cash Dividend Of $0.08 Per Share Payable June 10, 2020 To Stockholders April 28 (Reuters) - Rollins Inc: * BOARD DECLARED QTRLY CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.08 PER SHARE PAYABLE JUNE 10, 2020 TO STOCKHOLDERS * DIVIDEND CHANGE REFLECTS A REDUCTION FOR CURRENT PERIOD IN ANTICIPATION OF NUMEROUS BUSINESS-RELATED PANDEMIC UNCERTAINTIE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)

BRIEF-Rollins Says Has Purchased Stock Of UK's Guardian Pest Control May 17 (Reuters) - Rollins Inc: * ROLLINS PURCHASES GUARDIAN PEST CONTROL TO EXPAND GROWTH IN THE U.K. * ROLLINS INC - HAS PURCHASED STOCK OF GUARDIAN PEST CONTROL, OPERATING IN UNITED KINGDOM Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Rollins Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.22 April 25 (Reuters) - Rollins Inc: * ROLLINS, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RECORD FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.23, REVENUE VIEW $402.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * SAYS IMPROVED BENEFIT PLANS REDUCED Q1 EARNINGS BY $0.01 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
